doc.title: Era
doc.plot: The next greatest science fiction epic saga following in the footsteps of such sci-fi film classics like Star Wars and Star Trek. Mixed with modern contemporary events and innovative sci-fi themes and genres; ERA presents to the modern day science fiction movie fans, a new futuristic world of excitement and bewilderment with its thought-provoking topic and subject matter. Alike its inspiration and aspiration 'Star Wars'; ERA is the latest, greatest science fiction action epic saga told in six parts. This particular version of the movie series is the first three parts of the story condense and edit to one movie-showing to give an overall idea of how the complete saga unfolds in its entirety.
